snippet: The Gewürztraminers at the Lenz Winery were made to evolve slowly and the 2009 is waiting in the wings for the 2008 to run out.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews gewurztraminer wines from Long Island vineyards (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The Gewürztraminers at the Lenz Winery were made to evolve slowly and the 2009 is waiting in the wings for the 2008 to run out.

headline.print_headline: A Spicy Outlier Of Pink Grapes
headline.main: A Spicy Outlier of Pink Grapes
